entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming north 20 this afternoon. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023
